languages.text: "Нет причин лгать тебе, мон-кай. Впрочем, неважно, веришь ты мне или нет. Вы все равно уже здесь, а значит, я наконец-то умру".

traits.locale_text: {n}Фарсир окидывает псайкера усталым взглядом и мягко произносит:{/n} "Мне нет причин лгать тебе, мон-кай. Впрочем, мне не важно, веришь ты мне или нет. Вы все равно уже здесь, а значит, я наконец-то умру".
traits.speaker: TheDoorFarseer

languages.text: "I have no reason to lie to you, mon-keigh. However, your beliefs are of no matter. You are already here, which means I will finally die."
languages.original_text: "Нет причин лгать тебе, мон-кай. Впрочем, неважно, веришь ты мне или нет. Вы все равно уже здесь, а значит, я наконец-то умру".

traits.locale_text: "I have no reason to lie to you, mon-keigh. However, your beliefs are of no matter. You are already here, which means I will finally die."
traits.speaker: TheDoorFarseer

traits.locale_text: "I have no reason to lie to you, mon-keigh. However, your beliefs are of no matter. You are already here, which means I will finally die."
traits.speaker: TheDoorFarseer

traits.locale_text: "I have no reason to lie to you, mon-keigh. However, your beliefs are of no matter. You are already here, which means I will finally die."
traits.speaker: TheDoorFarseer

traits.locale_text: "I have no reason to lie to you, mon-keigh. However, your beliefs are of no matter. You are already here, which means I will finally die."
traits.speaker: TheDoorFarseer

traits.locale_text: "I have no reason to lie to you, mon-keigh. However, your beliefs are of no matter. You are already here, which means I will finally die."
traits.speaker: TheDoorFarseer

languages.text: “我没有理由对你说谎，猴子。不过，你相信什么并不重要。你已经出现在了这里，这也意味着我终于可以死了。”
languages.original_text: "I have no reason to lie to you, mon-keigh. However, your beliefs are of no matter. You are already here, which means I will finally die."

traits.locale_text: “我没有理由对你说谎，猴子。不过，你相信什么并不重要。你已经出现在了这里，这也意味着我终于可以死了。”
traits.speaker: TheDoorFarseer

languages.text: «No tengo motivos para mentirte, mon-keigh. Sin embargo, lo que creas es irrelevante. Ya estás aquí, por lo que por fin podré morir».
languages.original_text: "I have no reason to lie to you, mon-keigh. However, your beliefs are of no matter. You are already here, which means I will finally die."

traits.locale_text: «No tengo motivos para mentirte, mon-keigh. Sin embargo, lo que creas es irrelevante. Ya estás aquí, por lo que por fin podré morir».
traits.speaker: TheDoorFarseer

languages.text: "Ich habe keinen Grund Euch anzulügen, Chem-Pan-Sey. Aber Eure Überzeugungen sind irrelevant. Ihr seid bereits hier, und das bedeutet, dass ich endlich sterben werde."
languages.original_text: "I have no reason to lie to you, mon-keigh. However, your beliefs are of no matter. You are already here, which means I will finally die."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe keinen Grund Euch anzulügen, Chem-Pan-Sey. Aber Eure Überzeugungen sind irrelevant. Ihr seid bereits hier, und das bedeutet, dass ich endlich sterben werde."
traits.speaker: TheDoorFarseer

languages.text: 「モン＝ケイに対して嘘をつく理由などない。だが、お前の信念は問題ではない。お前がすでにここにいる。それはつまり私がようやく死ねるということだ」
languages.original_text: "I have no reason to lie to you, mon-keigh. However, your beliefs are of no matter. You are already here, which means I will finally die."

traits.locale_text: 「モン＝ケイに対して嘘をつく理由などない。だが、お前の信念は問題ではない。お前がすでにここにいる。それはつまり私がようやく死ねるということだ」
traits.speaker: TheDoorFarseer

languages.text: « Je n'ai aucune raison de vous mentir, mon-keigh. Mais ce que vous croyez n'a aucune importance. Votre venue ici signifie que je vais enfin mourir. »
languages.original_text: "I have no reason to lie to you, mon-keigh. However, your beliefs are of no matter. You are already here, which means I will finally die."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'ai aucune raison de vous mentir, mon-keigh. Mais ce que vous croyez n'a aucune importance. Votre venue ici signifie que je vais enfin mourir. »
traits.speaker: TheDoorFarseer

languages.text: "Sana yalan borcum yok mon-keigh. Neye inandığının önemi yok. Buraya geldiğinize göre nihayet ölümüme kavuşabileceğim."
languages.original_text: "I have no reason to lie to you, mon-keigh. However, your beliefs are of no matter. You are already here, which means I will finally die."

traits.locale_text: "Sana yalan borcum yok mon-keigh. Senin inançlarının bir önemi yok. Zaten burada olduğuna göre sonunda ölümüme kavuşabileceğim."
traits.speaker: TheDoorFarseer
